channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: Hegseth's military speech a "waste of time," Panetta says
item.description: Calling top military leaders to Quantico for a political speech was a "waste of time," former Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta said Wednesday at Axio...

item.title: Congress needs to hear more about Venezuela operation, Sen. Young says
item.description: Congress has been left in the dark about the U.S. military strikes off the coast of Venezuela , Sen. Todd Young (R-Ind.) said on Wednesday at Axios' F...

item.title: Right-wing outlets converge on Pentagon
item.description: A flood of conservative media outlets took the Pentagon up on its new restrictions to gain access to the building that many mainstream outlets rejecte...

item.title: Exclusive: Trump's border czar says 600k to be deported in 2025
item.description: ICE expects to deport more than 600,000 undocumented immigrants by the end of the year , President Trump's border czar Tom Homan said at Axios' Future...

item.title: Exclusive: Government shutdown signals weakness to foes, ex-Defense Secretary says
item.description: Democrats, Republicans and President Trump are "failing to govern" amid the ongoing government shutdown , former Defense Secretary Leon Panetta said o...

item.title: Nancy Pelosi has a new challenger. He doesn’t want to talk about her.
item.description: Scott Wiener, a California state senator, says his run is “not about other candidates” — including Pelosi.

item.title: Former GOP senator John Sununu announces bid for old seat in New Hampshire
item.description: Sununu is aiming to replace retiring Sen. Jeanne Shaheen in a race in which his party hopes to replace a Democrat with a Republican.

item.title: How Obama maneuvered behind the scenes to fight Trump on redistricting
item.description: The ex-president’s involvement reflects the deep anxieties he has about Trump’s agenda and has propelled him into a more political, public-facing role...

item.title: U.S. kills two aboard alleged drug boat in Pacific, widening Trump’s campaign
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth announced the strike but, consistent with others, declined to identify the victims or offer evidence verifying they wer...

item.title: Can anyone stop Trump’s teardown of the East Wing?
item.description: Many preservationists fear the answer is no. A pro-Trump review board is expected to approve the president’s planned 90,000-square-foot ballroom, too.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
